entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Red Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:10 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -20.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Red Lake Airport 06:00 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -20.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -26.7°C
Wind: ESE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
